author: Pierre-Marie Bisson
description: Also try this apéritif-style, bittersweet cocktail served on-the-rocks.
name: L'Heritage
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
10 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
